title: Girls Just Want to Have Fun
itunes:title: Girls Just Want to Have Fun
description:
Tuesday 2/13- Today on the show Daymond John stopped by and spoke about his new book Rise and Grind, the relaunch of FUBU and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to former MLB player Esteban Loaiza because he was arrested with 44 pounds of cocaine worth $500G. Also, once Angela reported the story of how Jhene Aiko met Big Sean during the Rumor Report, we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought of her story and if it was appropriate for her to go on the date with Big Sean given her situation. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Tuesday 2/13- Today on the show Daymond John stopped by and spoke about his new book Rise and Grind, the relaunch of FUBU and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to former MLB player Esteban Loaiza because he was arrested with 44 pounds of cocaine worth $500G. Also, once Angela reported the story of how Jhene Aiko met Big Sean during the Rumor Report, we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought of her story and if it was appropriate for her to go on the date with Big Sean given her situation.
